newsitem.title: CROATIA: Croatian stocks mixed in flat trade.
newsitem.headline: Croatian stocks mixed in flat trade.

text.p: Croatian stocks were mixed in flat trade on Wednesday, with blue chip Pliva PLVq.L coming into the spotlight.
* Seven of 15 active issues rose, seven fell and one was flat.
* Volume slightly lower at 19,690 units, turnover higher at 10.3 million kuna.
* Biggest gainer, brewery Karlovacka Pivovara added 20 kuna (or 4.5 percent) to 460, on volume of 608 shares.
* Biggest decliner textile firm Varteks lost eight kuna to 65 with 121 shares sold.
* Most active issue Pliva farmaceuticals rose six kuna to 499, selling 7,785 shares.
